title: Snow Clock
team: Myeongseong Kim, Donghyuk Yun, and Woohun Lee
summary: Snow Clock is a digital clock of snow globe theme.
By giving a feeling like accumulating and disappearing of snow, It expresses ephemerality of time flow.

paragraph: Snow Clock is a digital clock of snow globe theme.
By giving a feeling like accumulating and disappearing of snow, It expresses ephemerality of time flow.
It collects tiny Styrofoam balls using air suction.
